messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion]  Newbie list was List Changes and Additions
messages.messageBody:
leschke@... writes:

<< Do you think any oldtimers are going to hang around there to answer those
questions, or will it be more like beginners leading beginners?
Tia
>>

People will show up as newbies, learn what they can, stay around long enough
to lead others a bit, and then take off when they're sick of looking back, and
wanna look forward instead. That's my theory.

If anyone notices a dearth of experienced unschoolers on there, and they
wanna unsubcribe, post on here, and maybe a few of us will subscribe for a while.
I volunteer.

~Aimee
